name: Disasteroids (itch) (Pippepot)
description:
This is a (more) physically accurate asteroids game. You cut the big asteroids into tiny asteroids to gain points. Watch out for gravity holes! They will send every asteroid flying.

Its fairly straight forward. Have a go :)

Controls

WAD or arrow keys to move. Space to shoot.

Source code can be found here https://github.com/Pippepot/Disasteroids
